reviewText: The product was good but I received a DVD when I wanted a CD.  The product came quickly but it is not what I wanted.

My 2 sons have watched this tape so much I have to buy a new one.  It was a great value and not only teaches kids what the different equipment is but how to spell it.  Don't expect a major disney production here...just a simple film of construction equipment, how its used and all the crashing, building and down right boy stuff you can handle.
